
---
title: '微星推出新款 Creator P50 迷你主机：i5-12400F + RTX 3060，6899 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/6/40a3a597-d4af-4ec2-93d4-4addfc22736e.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 12 Jun 2022 15:04:50 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/6/40a3a597-d4af-4ec2-93d4-4addfc22736e.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="2617"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 6 月 12 日消息，微星面向设计师的迷你主机 Creator P50 现已推出 12 代酷睿版本，i5-12400F + RTX 3060 版本售价 6899 元。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="d254"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/6/40a3a597-d4af-4ec2-93d4-4addfc22736e.png" w="878" h="640" title="微星推出新款 Creator P50 迷你主机：i5-12400F + RTX 3060，6899 元" width="878" height="598" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="5fda"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/6/1af47bea-d130-4cdd-a3b1-4966a55265e8.png" w="1058" h="820" title="微星推出新款 Creator P50 迷你主机：i5-12400F + RTX 3060，6899 元" width="1058" height="636" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="85db"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/6/2fce51c1-8a16-44f9-8e00-7b59ccea606f.png" w="1050" h="768" title="微星推出新款 Creator P50 迷你主机：i5-12400F + RTX 3060，6899 元" width="1050" height="600" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="69fd">据介绍，微星 Creator P50 迷你主机是体现专业以及设计美学的创作者系列主机，<strong>体积不到 5 升</strong>，金属拉丝设计，外置电源设计，支持卧式和立式摆放。</p><p data-vmark="0dbf">配置方面，<strong>微星 Creator P50 搭载了 6 核 12 线程的 i5-12400F，主板为英特尔 H610，配备 RTX 3060 12GB 显卡</strong>，标配 16GB DDR4-3200 内存、512GB SSD 以及 1TB HDD，配备 2.5G 网口，支持 Wi-Fi 6E。</p><p data-vmark="68a3">目前，新款微星 Creator P50 只可选 i5 + RTX 3060 配置，售价 6899 元，秒杀价 6699 元。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100024835073"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/184351/2/25618/228729/629f21b4E3c13bb96/a718893104b31fbb.jpg" title="微星推出新款 Creator P50 迷你主机：i5-12400F + RTX 3060，6899 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">微星 (MSI) P50 设计师 迷你台式电脑 游戏主机</span></span><span class="card-abstract"> (12 代酷睿 i5-12400F 16G RTX3060 12G 独显 512G+1T) 227CN</span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">6899 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
